item.title: Gitea e Whoogle
item.description: Coloquei online uma instância do Gitea para alojar os meus repositórios git, e uma do Whoogle para que possas ter os resultados do Google Search sem o tracking

item.title: I've built a Manjaro repository
item.description: Due to my own dumbness (I mistakenly deleted my Ubuntu partition), I installed Manjaro, using the Manjaro Architect release, on my laptop. I’d been thinking about doing it for a while and finally made it because I was too stupid to read the instructions from cfdisk. The shit you create yourself because you’re in a hurry… Anyway, after installing Manjaro, I started reading a bit about this distro packaging and how I could leverage AUR and binary packages.
